mapper.select: select metroId, metroName from TBL_Metro where metroName like '%' || #{metroName} || '%'
select dongId, dongName from TBL_Dong where dongName like '%' || #{dongName} || '%'

select V.* from ( select row_number() over(order by reviewavgscore*count desc) as rank, T.*, round(F.reviewavgscore, 1), F.count, round(F.reviewavgscore*F.count, 1) as score from TBL_restaurant T join ( select restseq, avg(reviewavgscore) as reviewavgscore, count(*) as count from TBL_Review group by restseq )F on T.restSeq = F.restSeq )V where rank < 11
and ${option.parameter} like '%' || #{option.value} || '%'

select V.* from ( select row_number() over(order by reviewavgscore*count desc) as rank, T.*, round(F.reviewavgscore, 1), F.count, round(F.reviewavgscore*F.count, 1) as score from TBL_restaurant T join ( select restseq, avg(reviewavgscore) as reviewavgscore, count(*) as count from TBL_Review group by restseq )F on T.restSeq = F.restSeq )V where rank < 20 and restRegDate > (sysdate - 7)
